name: Sex Search 2: Ultimate
description:
Are you tired of a hard day at work? Or, on the contrary, do you want to strain your brains and make a test for the brain? Then this game is especially for you!
The essence of the game is simple - you have an exorcism in front of you and you need to find 10 hidden items of clothing.
The interest of the game also adds a variety of different game modes!
Among which:
1) Normal Mode - here you can spend a lot of time. The level will be randomly selected and all items of clothing will be scattered randomly across the field. After passing the level, you immediately move to another with the same rules.
2) Time Attack Mode - this mode is a challenge for your attentiveness! Here, in 60 seconds, you will need to look for 10 hidden items of clothing at a random level. For each item found, you will receive +2 seconds to the timer. When finding all the items on the level - you are moved to the next one, saving your time. How long can you last?
Game Features:
2 unique game modes
13 varied and desolate levels
*Unique system for placing items on levels
